title: Drug trader killed in Gaibandha
body: A young drug peddler was stabbed to death at Trimohoni area under Sadar upazila in Gaibandha. The youth is Soikot, 25, son of Ahammad Ali, at Masterpara of the district town. Local sources said that some unidentified individuals called Soikat and took him outside the house Wednesday night. Then locals found his body at the Trimohoni area at night bearing several marks of injury and rescued the body and sent it to his Mastarpara residence. Being informed, the police of Sadar Thana rushed to the spot and sent the body to Sadar Hospital morgue for autopsy. Local people said Soikat was a notorious drug trader. They formed a human chain in the locality several times against Soikat and his drug trading. He was accused of several drug cases.
